definition: to act willfully and make a scene/to make trouble
non-Han people, esp. from central Asia/reckless/outrageous/what?/why?/to complete a winning hand at mahjong (also written 和[hu2])
noisy/cacophonous/to make noise/to disturb/to vent (feelings)/to fall ill/to have an attack (of sickness)/to go in (for some activity)/to joke

sentences.english: Was this a lover, or a lecher whether?
sentences.chinese: 谁知这究竟是恋爱，还是瞎胡闹？

sentences.english: Stop pissing about. I've got work to do.
sentences.chinese: 别胡闹了，我还有活要干。

sentences.english: In the age of the farce, the choice can be made a lovely children.
sentences.chinese: 在可以胡闹的年龄，选择做了一个乖孩子。

sentences.english: If you behave so foolishly you must be ready to take the consequences.
sentences.chinese: 假如你这样瞎胡闹，就应该准备自食其果。

sentences.english: After school some students are horsing around in the park.
sentences.chinese: 放学后，一些学生在公园里胡闹。

sentences.english: "Idiotic?" Natalie said. "I was just deciding it's rather magical.
sentences.chinese: “瞎胡闹？”娜塔丽说，“我正觉得有点神奇呢。”

sentences.english: That boy is seldom serious about anything. He's sll the time clowning around.
sentences.chinese: 那个男孩对任何事件都不认真，他总是胡闹。

sentences.english: You have been raking and smoking too much, you wicked boy.
sentences.chinese: 你成天胡闹，吸烟吸得太多了，你这个淘气的孩子。

sentences.english: That man is seldom serious acres anything. He's sll the time clhaveing by oneself.
sentences.chinese: 这个男孩对任何事件都不认真，他总是胡闹。

sentences.english: He told the boys to quit their monkey business，or he would call a teacher.
sentences.chinese: 他告诉那些男孩子不要再胡闹，不然他就叫老师。

sentences.english: Stop larking about and get on with your work.
sentences.chinese: 别到处胡闹了，干活去吧。

sentences.english: These dissipations make against your chance of success.
sentences.chinese: 你这样胡闹下去，就很难有所成就了。

sentences.english: Were you serious, or was that a bit of tomfoolery?
sentences.chinese: 你是认真的呢，还是有点胡闹？

sentences.english: They are not working;they are just assing about.
You boys have been horsing about again, getting yourselves dirty.
sentences.chinese: 你们这些男孩们又在胡闹，把身上都弄脏了。

sentences.english: The prank went undetected around the world.
sentences.chinese: 全世界都没察觉这场胡闹。

definition: to act arbitrarily regardless of the rules/to mess with sth/to make a hash of things/to cause trouble
to make a scene/to fool around/to behave foolishly
regardless of the law and of natural morality (idiom); maverick/undisciplined and out of control
lit. not knowing what's important (idiom); no appreciation of the gravity of things/naive/doesn't know who's who/no sense of priorities
how can this be so? (idiom); preposterous/ridiculous/absurd
to berate/to excoriate/to chide/also written 喝斥[he1 chi4]
to berate/to excoriate/to chide/also written 呵斥[he1 chi4]
